DOC.criteria: IBS diagnosis Adult ( 18 year ) Be able read/understand/write swedish Severe heart failure Severe liver disease Severe neurologic disease Severe psychological disease Severe gastrointestinal disease ( i.e . celiac disease , IBD ( inflammatory bowel disease ) e.g . )
